casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Derrick D. BOGER 158P06-15 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 28, 2017 Derrick D. Boger, for Boger, Derrick D. Mary Carla Babb, Assistant Attorney General, Roxann L. Vaneekhoven, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 15th of September 2017 by Defendant for Writ of Coram Nobis:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 28th of September 2017."
